name: Lunar Swimming
description:
XKCD Game Jam

Inspiration: https://what-if.xkcd.com/124/

Get air and do flips for experience to unlock the upgrades. Arrows or WASD to move. Space to reset. Escape to quit.

Splash sounds are mutated versions of: "Water Swirl, Small, 12.wav" by InspectorJ of Freesound.org

Level-Up created with Bfxr

Experience can be cheated.
